video.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
video.synopsis: Sunnydale teen Buffy Summers craves an ordinary life but accepts her destiny as a Slayer by killing vampires and demons, aided by a band of friends.

episodes.synopsis: When teen vampire slayer Buffy tries to start a new life at Sunnydale High, she discovers that the school sits atop a demonic dimensional portal.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Hellmouth

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.
episodes.title: The Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Buffy suspects she has a witch on her hands when the cheerleading squad falls victim to sudden blindness and spontaneous combustion.
episodes.title: Witch

episodes.synopsis: The day after her biology teacher is killed by an unseen monster, Buffy meets a beautiful new substitute with an unhealthy insect obsession.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: With Buffy preoccupied by her date with Owen, Giles is trapped by a group of vampires seeking to raise a powerful leader.
episodes.title: Never Kill a Boy on the First Date

episodes.synopsis: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school.
episodes.title: The Pack

episodes.synopsis: Buffy discovers Angel's dark secret and hesitates to do anything about it, which could spell danger for someone she loves.
episodes.title: Angel

episodes.synopsis: Willow's new Internet chat buddy turns out to be a powerful demon electronically unleashed from a centuries-old, newly digitized book.
episodes.title: I Robot, You Jane

episodes.synopsis: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates who are performing in a talent show.
episodes.title: The Puppet Show

episodes.synopsis: A series of strange occurrences lead Buffy and her friends to discover that their worst nightmares have literally become reality.
episodes.title: Nightmares

episodes.synopsis: When an invisible menace starts attacking contenders in the upcoming May Queen election, the Scooby Gang traces the problem back to Cordelia.
episodes.title: Out of Mind, Out of Sight

episodes.synopsis: Giles discovers an ancient book foretelling Buffy's death at the hands of the Master.
episodes.title: Prophecy Girl

episodes.synopsis: Buffy returns from vacation and suffers from nightmares involving the Master. Meanwhile, the Anointed One and his followers plot their revenge.
episodes.title: When She Was Bad

episodes.synopsis: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the "perfect girlfriend" for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.
episodes.title: Some Assembly Required

episodes.synopsis: Buffy's mother and friends become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer.
episodes.title: School Hard

episodes.synopsis: A reanimated Inca princess makes her way to Sunnydale, where she sucks the life force from others in order to stay alive.
episodes.title: Inca Mummy Girl

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and Cordelia attend a frat party where they are offered as human sacrifices to a reptile-like creature.
episodes.title: Reptile Boy

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends patronize an unusual costume shop where customers turn into whatever costume they are wearing.
episodes.title: Halloween

episodes.synopsis: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of undead wannabes who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.
episodes.title: Lie to Me

episodes.synopsis: Giles's past comes back to haunt him, as a demon that he and Ethan Rayne had summoned in their wild youth seeks them out in Sunnydale.
episodes.title: The Dark Age

episodes.synopsis: Spike brings in three professional bounty hunters to eliminate Buffy while she ponders what her profession might be if her fate wasn't already sealed.
episodes.title: What's My Line?: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Buffy joins forces with another Slayer in hopes of saving Angel from the clutches of Spike and Drusilla.
episodes.title: What's My Line?: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Buffy's mom introduces her new boyfriend, who charms everyone except Buffy. When she confronts his dark side, she is left questioning her actions.
episodes.title: Ted

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends are in trouble when the eggs they are given in health class turn out to be parasites that take over their lives.
episodes.title: Bad Eggs

episodes.synopsis: To give Buffy a surprise on her 17th birthday, Drusilla and Spike bring together the body parts of a dismembered demon who cannot be killed.
episodes.title: Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends battle the Judge and face an unexpected danger from Angel, who has lost his soul after experiencing a moment of true happiness.
episodes.title: Innocence

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends discover secrets about themselves as they battle a werewolf, its hunter and their own emotions.
episodes.title: Phases

episodes.synopsis: As Valentine's Day approaches, Xander tries to improve his love life through witchcraft and finds himself with too much of a good thing.
episodes.title: Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered

episodes.synopsis: As Angel steps up his torment of Buffy and visits her nightly, Jenny attempts to reverse the gypsy curse that claimed his human soul.
episodes.title: Passion

episodes.synopsis: While hospitalized with a severe case of the flu, Buffy battles a demon that sucks the life out of sick children.
episodes.title: Killed by Death

episodes.synopsis: Sunnydale is haunted by the ghosts of a former student and teacher, who reenact their romance through the bodies of current students.
episodes.title: I Only Have Eyes For You

episodes.synopsis: Members of the Sunnydale swim team are killed by a gill monster of unknown origins.
episodes.title: Go Fish

episodes.synopsis: Angel revisits his storied past and, in the present, plots to revive an ancient demon bent on sweeping everything on Earth into Hell itself.
episodes.title: Becoming: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After being framed for Kendra's murder, Buffy strikes an unlikely alliance with Spike to keep Angel from destroying the world.
episodes.title: Becoming: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Buffy, living on her own in a big city, assists a woman whose boyfriend vanished. Back in Sunnydale, Buffy's friends try to battle the forces of evil.
episodes.title: Anne

episodes.synopsis: While Buffy readjusts to life back in Sunnydale, a Nigerian mask reanimates the dead, forcing her to battle a horde of zombies.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Party

episodes.synopsis: A charismatic slayer visits Sunnydale, winning over many of Buffy's friends. At the same time, two powerful vampires are plotting an attack.
episodes.title: Faith, Hope and Trick

episodes.synopsis: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occurs in Sunnydale. Meanwhile, Angel returns from Acathla's hell dimension.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beasts

episodes.synopsis: As Buffy and Cordelia vie for the homecoming queen title, they are targeted by a group of killers participating in SlayerFest '98.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Adults throughout Sunnydale begin behaving like immature teenagers after they ingest candy manufactured by the forces of evil.
episodes.title: Band Candy

episodes.synopsis: With some help from Faith's new watcher, Buffy seeks to destroy a weapon-like glove before it falls into the hands of a demon.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in hopes of creating a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him once more.
episodes.title: Lovers Walk

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.
episodes.title: The Wish

episodes.synopsis: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions who want him to eliminate Buffy.
episodes.title: Amends

episodes.synopsis: After discovering the corpses of two young children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.
episodes.title: Gingerbread

episodes.synopsis: As her birthday approaches, Buffy loses her slayer powers and must do battle with a vampire who is not only extremely powerful but also quite mad.
episodes.title: Helpless

episodes.synopsis: Xander encounters a group of reanimated corpses who are constructing a bomb. Meanwhile, Buffy battles the forces of evil when the Hellmouth reopens.
episodes.title: The Zeppo

episodes.synopsis: While on a mission to retrieve an amulet with Buffy, Faith inadvertently kills a mortal during a battle with a demon's minions.
episodes.title: Bad Girls

episodes.synopsis: A homicide detective closes in on Buffy and Faith as he investigates the deputy mayor's death, and Xander attempts to confront Faith himself.
episodes.title: Consequences

episodes.synopsis: While casting a magic spell, Anya and Willow inadvertently summon Willow's evil double from an alternate universe.
episodes.title: Doppelgangland

episodes.synopsis: As Faith attempts to seduce Angel and steal his soul, the Mayor summons a dark-magic demon to finish the job.
episodes.title: Enemies

episodes.synopsis: A mouthless demon infects Buffy with the ability to hear everyone's thoughts, but what starts out as a useful power soon turns into a curse.
episodes.title: Earshot

episodes.synopsis: The Mayor takes Willow prisoner after Buffy and her friends steal away a box containing demonic energy needed for Ascension Day.
episodes.title: Choices

episodes.synopsis: After Angel breaks off their relationship, Buffy single-handedly battles three hell hounds so that her classmates can enjoy their senior prom.
episodes.title: The Prom

episodes.synopsis: To distract Buffy from Ascension Day, the Mayor instructs Faith to give Angel a poison for which the only antidote is the blood of a Slayer.
episodes.title: Graduation Day: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On Ascension Day, Buffy and her friends prepare for the ultimate battle as they face off against the Mayor and a hoard of vampires.
episodes.title: Graduation Day: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Buffy feels like a fish out of water in her first year at college, but the mysterious disappearance of a fellow student puts her back in her element.
episodes.title: The Freshman

episodes.synopsis: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.
episodes.title: Living Conditions

episodes.synopsis: As Buffy has an affair with a handsome student, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.
episodes.title: The Harsh Light of Day

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted frat house complete with bats, zombies and a demon from beyond.
episodes.title: Fear, Itself

episodes.synopsis: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends morph into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.
episodes.title: Beer Bad

episodes.synopsis: When Oz falls hard for a sexy singer who also happens to be a werewolf, he must choose between Willow and his own animal instincts.
episodes.title: Wild at Heart

episodes.synopsis: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a futuristic lab located beneath the streets of Sunnydale.
episodes.title: The Initiative

episodes.synopsis: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers.
episodes.title: Pangs

episodes.synopsis: One of Willow's spells causes Giles to go blind, Buffy and Spike to plan a wedding, and Xander to become a magnet for demons.
episodes.title: Something Blue

episodes.synopsis: When everyone in Sunnydale loses their voice, the Scooby Gang must silently solve the mystery of the monsters who stole their ability to speak.
episodes.title: Hush

episodes.synopsis: While attempting to redefine her relationship with Riley, Buffy must also stop demons that are determined to reopen the Hellmouth.
episodes.title: Doomed

episodes.synopsis: After being transformed into a demon, Giles attempts to track down Ethan Rayne in hopes of reversing the process.
episodes.title: A New Man

episodes.synopsis: Buffy teams with Riley after she is allowed access to the mysterious underground complex known as the Initiative; Spike is targeted by commandos.
episodes.title: The I In Team

episodes.synopsis: Tension erupts between Buffy and Riley as they pursue Maggie Walsh's killer. Meanwhile, Walsh's creation, the cyborg demon Adam, roams Sunnydale.
episodes.title: Goodbye Iowa

episodes.synopsis: As Riley joins Buffy in the hunt for the rogue man-demon-machine Adam, Faith awakens from a coma and seeks revenge against Buffy.
episodes.title: This Year's Girl

episodes.synopsis: After switching bodies, Buffy finds herself at the mercy of several Watchers' Council members as Faith uses Buffy's body to further her own ends.
episodes.title: Who Are You?

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends sense that something's amiss when a ubiquitous Jonathan becomes a hero to everyone in Sunnydale.
episodes.title: Superstar

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and Riley's round-the-clock lovemaking stirs up some of the supernatural elements that have been lying dormant in the Lowell fraternity house.
episodes.title: Where the Wild Things Are

episodes.synopsis: Oz's return to Sunnydale leads to his incarceration inside the Initiative and complicates the relationship between Willow and Tara.
episodes.title: New Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: After joining forces with Adam, Spike drives a wedge between Buffy and her friends; Angel's return leads to a confrontation with Riley.
episodes.title: The Yoko Factor

episodes.synopsis: Having gained control of Riley's mind, Adam sets in motion his plot to destroy the Initiative and create an army of unstoppable soldiers.
episodes.title: Primeval

episodes.synopsis: After their victory against Adam, Buffy, Willow, Xander and Giles experience dreams in which they are pursued by a mysterious figure.
episodes.title: Restless

episodes.synopsis: The one-and-only Dracula makes his way to Sunnydale and immediately has everyone enchanted. Even Buffy might not be able to resist his charms.
episodes.title: Buffy vs. Dracula

episodes.synopsis: As Harmony and her vampire gang plot Buffy's demise, Buffy uses her diary entries to teach Dawn everything she needs to know about slaying.
episodes.title: Real Me

episodes.synopsis: A strange blast from the demon Toth's weapon seems to create two Xanders, leaving the real Xander to convince his friends of his true identity.
episodes.title: The Replacement

episodes.synopsis: As Riley's health begins deteriorating, Spike and Harmony force a surgeon to remove the behavior modification chip imbedded in Spike's brain.
episodes.title: Out of My Mind

episodes.synopsis: Buffy learns more about Dawn after she discovers a mysterious orb linked to a group of monks being pursued by an incredibly powerful force.
episodes.title: No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: Tara uses a spell on her friends to keep them from learning her "secret." Meanwhile, Glory unleashes a hoard of demons to hunt down Buffy.
episodes.title: Family

episodes.synopsis: After being bested in a fight by an ordinary vampire, Buffy asks Spike to explain how he killed two Slayers many years earlier.
episodes.title: Fool for Love

episodes.synopsis: Glory transforms a snake into a terrifying monster in her quest to find the Key; Joyce is hospitalized after being diagnosed with an illness.
episodes.title: Shadow

episodes.synopsis: As Joyce develops a brain tumor that makes her do odd things, a demon emerges from a meteorite and begins killing the mentally ill.
episodes.title: Listening to Fear

episodes.synopsis: After Buffy catches Riley in the clutches of a vampire junkie, Riley makes an important decision regarding their relationship.
episodes.title: Into the Woods

episodes.synopsis: While Giles is in England meeting with the Watchers' Council, Anya and Willow mind the magic store and inadvertently conjure up a fearsome troll.
episodes.title: Triangle

episodes.synopsis: The Watchers' Council travels to Sunnydale to review Buffy's skills as a Slayer; meanwhile, Glory puts her search for the Key into high gear.
episodes.title: Checkpoint

episodes.synopsis: When Dawn learns her true origins as the mystical key to unlocking dimensions, she runs away and winds up face to face with Glory.
episodes.title: Blood Ties

episodes.synopsis: A thoroughly repulsed Buffy learns that Spike has a crush on her, a situation made all the more dangerous by Drusilla's arrival in Sunnydale.
episodes.title: Crush

episodes.synopsis: When the Scoobies investigate a pretty girl looking for her boyfriend, they realize she's actually an incredibly strong, love-crazy robot.
episodes.title: I Was Made to Love You

episodes.synopsis: As the group helps Buffy and Dawn deal with the aftermath of their mother's tragedy, Buffy begins imagining alternate realities.
episodes.title: The Body

episodes.synopsis: As Buffy finds comfort in a visit from an old friend, a distraught Dawn enlists Spike to help her use magic to bring her mother back.
episodes.title: Forever

episodes.synopsis: Buffy embarks on a quest with the Primitive, Spike cavorts with his own "Buffybot," and Glory instructs her minions to learn the Key's true identity.
episodes.title: Intervention

episodes.synopsis: When Tara falls victim to Glory's incredible power, Willow embraces dark magic and launches a counterattack.
episodes.title: Tough Love

episodes.synopsis: Realizing they might never be able to vanquish Glory, Buffy and the gang decide it's time to flee from Sunnydale in Spike's R.V. to save Dawn's life.
episodes.title: Spiral

episodes.synopsis: When Buffy lapses into a catatonic state, Willow uses magic to find out why; a tug-of-war erupts between Glory and Ben over Dawn's ultimate fate.
episodes.title: The Weight of the World

episodes.synopsis: As Glory prepares Dawn for a ritual that will open a portal to another dimension and destroy the universe, Buffy and her friends prepare for battle.
episodes.title: The Gift

episodes.synopsis: The gang hope to bring Buffy back from the dead. Meanwhile, motorcycle-riding demons discover the Buffybot had been posing as the Slayer.
episodes.title: Bargaining: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the Hellions continue to ravage Sunnydale, a feral Buffy claws her way out of her own grave and must come to the aid of her friends.
episodes.title: Bargaining: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends battle a demon that may have "hitched a ride" with Buffy as she crossed into the world from another dimension.
episodes.title: After Life

episodes.synopsis: While trying to get a loan, Buffy runs afoul of three deadbeat sorcerers who are using the otherworldly powers of a demon to rob a bank.
episodes.title: Flooded

episodes.synopsis: Buffy's powers are tested by Andrew, Jonathan and Warren, who seek to expose and exploit her weaknesses in an effort to destroy her.
episodes.title: Life Serial

episodes.synopsis: Dawn discovers her crush has a deadly secret. Xander announces his engagement to Anya, and Tara worries about Willow's reliance on magic.
episodes.title: All the Way

episodes.synopsis: In this musical extravaganza, Sunnydale residents find themselves bursting into song, and flame, when a demon attempts to make Dawn his bride.
episodes.title: Once More, with Feeling

episodes.synopsis: While trying to find a way to make Buffy forget about her afterlife experience, Willow inadvertently casts a spell that erases everyone's memories.
episodes.title: Tabula Rasa

episodes.synopsis: Willow turns Amy the Rat into her old self; Jonathan, Warren and Andrew steal a diamond; and Spike discovers something unexpected about Buffy.
episodes.title: Smashed

episodes.synopsis: Amy introduces Willow to a warlock whose powerful black magic proves addictive; Buffy and Spike deal with the aftermath of their night of passion.
episodes.title: Wrecked

episodes.synopsis: Jonathan, Warren and Andrew's latest gadget makes Buffy invisible and threatens to turn her molecular structure to goo.
episodes.title: Gone

episodes.synopsis: At her new fast-food job, Buffy believes that her disappearing co-workers and the secret ingredient in the hamburger patties may be connected.
episodes.title: Doublemeat Palace

episodes.synopsis: When Jonathan, Warren and Andrew accidentally kill a young woman, they concoct a plan to pin the death on Buffy.
episodes.title: Dead Things

episodes.synopsis: Buffy suspects Dawn may be to blame when a spell of unknown origin traps partygoers inside Buffy's house with a sword-wielding monster.
episodes.title: Older and Far Away

episodes.synopsis: Buffy's old boyfriend, Riley Finn, shows up unexpectedly as he tracks a demon about to hatch eggs that could wipe out Sunnydale.
episodes.title: As You Were

episodes.synopsis: Anya and Xander's wedding is thrown into turmoil when a man claiming to be Xander's future self turns up at the ceremony.
episodes.title: Hell's Bells

episodes.synopsis: Warren, Jonathan and Andrew unleash a demon whose powers make Buffy believe that her friends are figments of her imagination.
episodes.title: Normal Again

episodes.synopsis: Anya returns to Sunnydale with vengeance on her mind and ends up hurting Xander in a way she never expected.
episodes.title: Entropy

episodes.synopsis: When magic crystals infuse Warren with superhuman strength, he and his friends go on a crime spree, leading to a tragic confrontation with Buffy.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: A vengeful Willow uses her enormous power to track down Warren and avenge Tara's death -- despite Buffy's strong feelings about targeting humans.
episodes.title: Villains

episodes.synopsis: Fueled by black magic, Willow targets Andrew and Jonathan, leading to a battle between Buffy and Willow; Spike fights an unstoppable foe.
episodes.title: Two to Go

episodes.synopsis: After sucking all the energy out of Giles, a powerful Willow sets off to destroy the world; meanwhile, Buffy and Dawn are trapped inside a pit.
episodes.title: Grave

episodes.synopsis: When Sunnydale High is rebuilt, Buffy accompanies Dawn to school for her first day of classes, only to encounter evil spirits living in the basement.
episodes.title: Lessons

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends come to the aid of a woman being pursued by a gigantic worm-like creature, only to learn that its appearance is linked to Anya.
episodes.title: Beneath You

episodes.synopsis: Willow's return proves problematic when she is literally unable to see her friends -- and is left with a creature that paralyzes its victims.
episodes.title: Same Time, Same Place

episodes.synopsis: Settling into her job as the counselor at Sunnydale High, Buffy is at a loss when a student calmly states that she has only a week to live.
episodes.title: Help

episodes.synopsis: Anya's violent and deadly act of vengeance leaves everyone stunned. Buffy must put aside her feelings and take action before more people die.
episodes.title: Selfless

episodes.synopsis: Xander and Spike search for the source of a spell that has bewitched the girls into competing for the affections of the high school quarterback.
episodes.title: Him

episodes.synopsis: Buffy strikes up a conversation with a vampire who was once an acquaintance in high school. Dawn defends Joyce from a menacing creature.
episodes.title: Conversations with Dead People

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be to blame when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.
episodes.title: Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against with the First by taking Spike prisoner; Xander and Anya interrogate Andrew.
episodes.title: Never Leave Me

episodes.synopsis: Giles returns with three potential slayers whom Buffy must protect from the First, setting in motion a battle between Buffy and an über-vampire.
episodes.title: Bring on the Night

episodes.synopsis: Buffy teaches the potential slayers a lesson as she faces off against the über-vampire. Giles and Anya consult a demon about defeating the First.
episodes.title: Showtime

episodes.synopsis: Buffy brings the potential slayers to a demon bar and a crypt, where Buffy squares off against a vampire. Dawn discovers she's a potential slayer.
episodes.title: Potential

episodes.synopsis: Willow changes into Warren after she and Kennedy kiss. The behavior modification chip causes Spike to suffer. The gang suspects Giles is the First.
episodes.title: The Killer in Me

episodes.synopsis: Buffy goes on a date with Principal Wood, Xander dates a strange girl, and the First attempts to convince Andrew to kill the potential slayers.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: Buffy finds herself confronting the men who created the original Slayer, while Spike and the others try to defeat a demon in hopes of returning Buffy.
episodes.title: Get It Done

episodes.synopsis: Andrew records Buffy's exploits for the benefit of future generations, but soon Buffy and the others connect him to the Seal of Danzalthar.
episodes.title: Storyteller

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and her friends attempt to unravel the secret behind the First's control over Spike, and Wood seeks Giles's cooperation in destroying Spike.
episodes.title: Lies My Parents Told Me

episodes.synopsis: Despite Giles's deep misgivings, Buffy leads the potential slayers into battle against a powerful preacher who has joined forces with the First.
episodes.title: Dirty Girls

episodes.synopsis: Devastated by their defeat, the potential slayers turn against Buffy while Spike and Andrew question a priest, and Faith battles police officers.
episodes.title: Empty Places

episodes.synopsis: Faith and the potential slayers search for a subterranean arsenal, Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard, and things heat up for Willow and Kennedy.
episodes.title: Touched

episodes.synopsis: The potential slayers face their deadliest challenge when the über-vamps attack. After the First fills Caleb with power, Caleb and Buffy duke it out.
episodes.title: End of Days

episodes.synopsis: Buffy and the potential slayers launch an all-out war on Caleb, the First and the army of über-vampires amassing beneath Sunnydale High School.
episodes.title: Chosen
